name: OP9: A Cold War Adventure
description:
This is a beta test version of the visual novel OP9, written and developed by Lauren Smyth, Audrey Henry, and the Achromia Games team. This demo version includes the entire story, music, and background art, but no character art. The full game is projected to release by the end of 2019.

The story begins on June 25th, 1991. Play as Ami Madison, professional translator and new recruit in a secret organization known only as OP9. When asked to leave your desk job and join six advanced recruits on a dangerous mission into the Soviet Union, will you accept?

Once you've finished playing, please fill out a short survey about the game. If you provide us your email address and the code shown at the game's 'good ending,' we'll send you free access to the full version once it's released.
